scripts.g:migration: docker-compose exec backend rails g migration
scripts.linters: yarn rspec:quick && yarn rubocop && yarn audit && yarn brakeman
scripts.rspec:quick: docker-compose exec -e RAILS_ENV=test backend rake parallel:spec
scripts.docs: docker-compose exec -e SWAGGER_DRY_RUN=0 -e RAILS_ENV=test backend rails rswag
scripts.clean: if [ -d tmp/storage ]; then rm -r tmp/storage; fi && cd log && for file in *; do echo '' > $file; done || echo 'please run: sudo chmod 777 -R log'
